sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 36 cm. Find the length of its one side.
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of one side, we can divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Perimeter = 36 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of one side = Perimeter / Number of sides = 36 cm / 3 = 12 cm

The length of one side of the equilateral triangle is 12 cm.
